title: Hotel on prime beach land
details:
Hotel / Restaurant for sale , Directly situated on the beach side near other famous hotels.
Land size = 23 perch
Private beach land = 20 perch
Outdoor Swimming pool
Commercial building with 3 floors.
Groundfloor :
Suitable for restaurant or any kinds of parties & events.
Beach side having sunbeds and dinning tables with sun shade umbrella's .
Bar & Kitchen

First Floor:
2 Family apartments sea view & 4 double rooms, 1 apartment with balcony on road side

Second Floor:
2 Family apartments sea view & 4 double rooms, 1 apartment with balcony on road side
Possibility to build a extra floor for expanding the rooms.
The location is ideal for exploit a beach bar, water sport activities , night live entertainment.
Please call for futher information or visit on site.
